div.p: Aged 55 years III. The Girl Christine Sieber. She was born at gnadenfry??? the 10th of Sept. 1757. After her Valent Departure of this Life, she came with her Mother as a little child into the Widows House, where every Body loved her. In her tenderest years she had a Feeling of our Saviour in her Heart, and in the Day Time She was educated with the Children in the Anstalt. Ano 50 the 18th October She received quite in the Children Anstalt, where She in Comunion with other Children kept many a Liturgie to our Saviour. Ano 58 She was received into the Children Congregation. Allway it was a great Blessing to her, when She in comunion with the Children was allowed ot prostrate her self to our Saviour. Her poor Body was so weakly that at last all her limbs grow lame. Therefore she must be carryed everywhere. This caus'd her many a Smart & some tinier impatience that She must loose so many fine Meetings. But when She thought on our Saviour and is Smart, then She was in her Heart ashamed & of all Heart contented. She wept many Tears & very often confessed: I am a poor & miserable Child, & for all that our ​​​​​​​dear

dear Saviour loveth me, as is very often on my Place so near to me, that I am not able to describe it. I am willing from all my Heart to renounce every Thing in his Way, to make me soon to his Pleasure. the 3th April She was still with her Children very amusing. The 4th She complaint about great Pain on her Breast, & declared directly that she is to go home, for that reason She took by her Sisters who attended & thanked them two times for their Care & trouble whith She made & promised to think on them by our dear Saviour. After that She toock Leave in a very tender maner by her Mother & desireth she would sing Verses, as among the rest these: Ich riech mich auf Ven Sabbat ang. Mein Seelgen wird such bald einmal aus feinen Hüttchen shwingen. Her Children continued with a sweet Litgurgie around her Bed. After that her tender Desire by our Saviour was to call her soon home. And said very often: Lovely Lamb, pray come soon! Asoon and in the Evening at 11 a cllok she went happy home in our Heaven .Wound in her 12 Years of Age
